attributes.action: Pull the IWF or re-think its methods for the better of the internet and The Users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After reading posts from hundreds of people and seing first hand what the IWF are doing is
1: Useless as they are blocking an image or other content in one place where you can get it a million other places - so whats the point
2: Preventing Internet Services from working properly (mainly static IP address info getting through to servers and server being able to tell the difference from users)
3: Slowing the internet up
4: Invading everyones right to privacy
5: Putting bad name to legit websites like wikipedia

I am not saying don't protect child abuse etc but the method currently at hand is NOT protecting child abuse and causing major disruption and anger.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
